custom-sql.sql: select e.employeeId, e.employeeName, d.designationName from foo_designation d, foo_employee e where d.designationId = e.designationId
select employeeId,employeeName,employeeMobile,employeeEmail,branchId,departmentId,designationId from foo_employee where employeeName Like ?

(select e.employeeId,e.employeeName,e.employeeMobile,e.employeeEmail,e.branchId,e.departmentId,e.designationId from foo_employee e, foo_branch b where b.branchId = e.branchId AND b.branchName LIKE ? ) UNION (select e.employeeId,e.employeeName,e.employeeMobile,e.employeeEmail,e.branchId,e.departmentId,e.designationId from foo_employee e, foo_department d where e.departmentId = d.departmentId AND d.departmentName LIKE ? ) UNION (select e.employeeId,e.employeeName,e.employeeMobile,e.employeeEmail,e.branchId,e.departmentId,e.designationId from foo_employee e, foo_designation de where e.designationId = de.designationId AND de.designationName LIKE ? ) UNION (select e.employeeId,e.employeeName,e.employeeMobile,e.employeeEmail,e.branchId,e.departmentId,e.designationId from foo_employee e where e.employeeName LIKE ? )
